enquiry-reason.header: What is your enquiry related to?

enquiry.header: What is the reason for your enquiry?

confirm.header: Is the information you have given us correct?
confirm.subheader: Check and make sure the information below is right. If it isn't you can change it here.

confirmation.header: Thank you, we have received your information.
confirmation.email: We have sent you an email containing the information you have provided to

para.one: Our staff will review the information you have sent and speak with the courier if necessary to find out why your card hasn't yet arrived.
para.two: As each BRP delivery is tracked, we will be able to find your BRP card and arrange redelivery.
para.three: We shall be in touch with you as soon as possible. During very busy periods this can take up to 5 working days.
